item.description:
Mohegan Sun Fun * Food * Music and new friends with the CT Party Club

21 and over please
Play the games - Check out the music -and have a great time!

PLUS

FREE CONCERT IN THE MOHEGAN SUN WOLF DEN

1994 Grammy Award Winners Soul Asylum BEST ROCK SONG * Runaway Train

CLICK HERE FOR VIDEO or visit http://www.entertheso...

In 1992, Soul Asylum released Grave Dancers Union, a record that would come to transform them from underground college rockers to international superstars. The first two singles off the album, "Somebody To Shove" and "Black Gold," both came in at high positions at the Modern Rock and Album Rock charts, but it was the album's third track that led them to their major breakthrough. "Runaway Train" peaked at #5 on the Billboard Hot 100, raised album sales to double-platinum level and won Soul Asylum the Grammy Award for "Best Rock Song" in 1994.


You can join the group to see the show, or join the group playing in the Casino

The VIP bus trip includes a $33 VIP BONUS:

$18 Buffet Dinner and $15 of Playing Money

Your seat on the bus is better than FREE because your
$33 VIP BONUS is more than your ticket!

We will arrive at Mohegan Sun at 6:00 pm
(The VIP Bonus that you receive can be used to pay for your buffet, or used at any shop or Restaurant at Mohegan Sun)
Next, you choose between playing at the Casino, or a concert

Next, you choose between playing at the Casino, or a concert
with at the Wolf's Den at 9 pm with SOUL ASYLUM.

After the concert, enjoy Mohegan Sun until MIDNIGHT when our bus leaves

The CT Party Club Bus has 50 seats and will sell out quickly - so get your ticket today!

BUS PICKUP SCHEDULE:

3:15 Middletown * Commuter Parking Lot on Country Club Rd, exit 20 off I-91.

4:00 Farmington * Commuter Parking Lot on Fienemann Rd, exit 37 off I-84

4:30 Windsor * Commuter Parking Lot Route 75, exit 38 off I-91

4:45 Glastonbury * Commuter Parking Lot on Main St (Route 3) Exit 5 off Route 2 Across from Burger King

ALL CT PARTY BUS TICKET HOLDERS WILL BE EMAILED DETAILED BUS PICKUP INFO

Arriving at 6:00pm for Dinner Buffet at Mohegan Sun

Soul Asylum Concert starts at 9 pm

We have only 50 seats available on a privately chartered PARTY BUS
- so get your ticket before we sell out

ADVANCE TICKETS GUARANTEES YOUR SEAT * Only $35
SPECIAL - 2 Tickets for $60

TICKETS ON THE PARTY BUS ARE $45 IF ANY REMAIN (Glastonbury location only - call for available seats)

Visit http://www.CTPartyClu... or CLICK HERE

call (860) 236-3343
